translations: vt.使着迷；对……施催眠术；使恍惚
vi.施催眠术；使进入睡觉状态

phrs.translation: 施催眠术, 催眠, 使入迷, 使欲睡
傀儡大师, 傀儡巨匠
彩色的灯光会令人恍惚, 我再也不想看到你的身影

sentences.sentence: A hypnotherapist will hypnotize you and will stop you from smoking.
sentences.translation: 催眠疗法医生将对你进行催眠，帮你戒烟。

sentences.sentence: She hypnotize him into do thing against his own will.
sentences.translation: 她给他施催眠术让他做出违反本意的事。

sentences.sentence: Surprisingly, the ability to hypnotize yourself can be learnt in a single session.
sentences.translation: 出人意料的是，自我催眠术只要上一次课就可以学会。
